summary: This is an email chain from July 17, 2019, forwarding a legal filing related to Jeffrey Epstein's detention and referencing a New York Magazine article about Epstein's connections to Donald Trump and Mar-a-Lago. The email includes an attachment of a redacted detention submission filing.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded legal filing (detention submission) and the NY Magazine article discussing his connections.

persons.name: Donald Trump
persons.context: Mentioned in the NY Magazine article linked in the email, regarding his social connections to Jeffrey Epstein at Mar-a-Lago.

connections.description: The NY Magazine article discusses their social connections and interactions at Mar-a-Lago.

events.title: Epstein Detention Submission Filing
events.description: A legal filing regarding Jeffrey Epstein's detention was submitted, as referenced in the attached redacted PDF.

events.title: NY Magazine Article Publication
events.description: An article published by New York Magazine/The Cut discussing Jeffrey Epstein's connections to Donald Trump and Mar-a-Lago.

keyFacts: A legal filing regarding Jeffrey Epstein's detention was submitted on July 16, 2019, and was being forwarded via email on July 17, 2019.
The email references a contemporaneous NY Magazine article investigating Epstein's social connections to Donald Trump at Mar-a-Lago.
The correspondence originates from or involves the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (Public Affairs).
The attached legal document is a redacted version of the detention submission.
